attributes.action: support the introduction of a misrepresentation of the people act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Support the introduction of the misrepresentation of the people act, to be introduced by Plaid Cymru MP Adam Price as an early day motion, to ensure honesty, transparency and accountability from the representative of the People and their employees.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
